member.name: F:PPJ.Runtime.XSal.XSal.SAM_HotSpotClick
member.summary:
The form, dialog or MDI receive this message when the user clicks the left mouse button on the hot spot.
wParam = HotSpot ID lParam = Mouse position

member.name: F:PPJ.Runtime.XSal.XSal.SAM_HotSpotMouseMove
member.summary:
The form, dialog or MDI receive this message when the user moves the mouse on the hot spot.
wParam = HotSpot ID if the mouse is entering the hot spot or NULL if the mouse is leaving the hot spot. lParam = Mouse position

member.name: F:PPJ.Runtime.XSal.XSal.SAM_DrawCell
member.summary:
Callback message for cell drawing The table window receives this message each time a custom drawn cell needs to be repainted.
wParam = cell selected flag (TRUE or FALSE) lParam = pointer to a structure with drawing information. Use it with XSalTblGetCustomInfo().

member.name: F:PPJ.Runtime.XSal.XSal.SAM_SwapRows
member.summary:
Notification message from XSalTblSortRows. The table window receives this message each time the quick-sort routine swaps two rows.
wParam = first row lParam = second row

member.name: F:PPJ.Runtime.XSal.XSal.SAM_ToolboxSetPosition
member.summary:
The toolbox receives this message when it's orientation and position are being changed. This allows the program to change some visual aspect of the toolbox.
wParam = The new orientation flag lParam = not used

member.name: F:PPJ.Runtime.XSal.XSal.SAM_ToolboxUpdateMenu
member.summary:
Send to the form that owns the tool bars. The app can modify the popup menu before it's displayed by processing this event. The menu object can be accessed using the form's ContextMenu property or VT menu functions using wParam for the menu handle.
wParam = Handle for the menu lParam = not used.

member.name: M:PPJ.Runtime.XSal.XSal.GZipOpen(PPJ.Runtime.SalNumber@,PPJ.Runtime.SalString,PPJ.Runtime.SalString)
member.summary:
GZIP file handling BOOL XSalGZipOpen( gzFile* p_lpFile, LPSTR p_lpszFileName, LPSTR p_lpszMode )
Opens a XSalGZip (.gz) file for reading or writing. The mode parameter is as in fopen ("rb" or "wb") but can also include a compression level ("wb9") or a strategy: 'f' for filtered data as in "wb6f", 'h' for Huffman only compression as in "wb1h".

member.name: T:PPJ.Runtime.XSal.XSalTableWindow.SingleImageMap
member.summary: Special ImageMap that holds only one image and returns it in all cases. The FlexGrid can assign ImageMaps to cells, rows, columns and ranges but the images are shown when the value matches the key in the map. With this map, the single image is shown regardless of the value.
